original_text: You will cause blind people to see. You will cause prisoners to be free. You will bring out into the open people who sit in dark prisons. You will cause blind people to see.
korean_text: 네가 눈먼 자들의 눈을 밝히며 갇힌 자를 감옥에서 이끌어 내며 흑암에 앉은 자를 감방에서 나오게 하리라

sentences.original_text: You will cause blind people to see.
You will cause prisoners to be free.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 포로들이 자유롭게 되게 하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: You will bring out into the open
people who sit in dark prisons.
You will cause blind people to see.
